alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 3:09AM EDT until July 11 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast New Jersey, including the following county, Bergen. * WHEN...Until 900 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 309 AM EDT, gauge reports indicated heavy rain. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Paramus, Ridgewood, Upper Saddle River, Ho-Ho-Kus and Saddle River. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
